metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4577 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: A certain Debian patch for GNU GRUB uses world-readable permissions for grub.cfg, which allows local users to obtain password hashes, as demonstrated by reading the password_pbkdf2 directive in the file.

criterions.comment: grub2 package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.00-20').
